dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where (not exists (select * from dmr_content where any parent_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and full_format = 'pdf')) and (exists (select v.object_name from d2_dictionary_value v ,d2_dictionary d where d.object_name ='RenderableFormats' and d.object_name =v.dictionary_name and v.object_name in (select UPPER(dos_extension) from dm_format where name ='$value(a_content_type)')))
